note.p: Birth: 80 High Holborn, London, England (27 November 1791)

Career: Went into glass manufacture business with his father; took out several patents for glass production; Member of the common council of the city of London; secured the right of Jews to admission to the Freedom of the City of London; MP for Southwark (1852-1857); was a prominent Congregationalist
Notes: Probable birth place: father's glass warehouse was there.
